name: Alot Digital Solutions
description: Alot Digital Solutions is an omnichannel messaging platform that enables businesses to interact with their customers or users across various messaging channels, including WhatsApp, SMS, RCS, Email & Voice calls. It is powered by conversational automation and AI-based chatbots, capable of engaging users in multiple languages. Additionally, it features a one-view inbox for managing omnichannel conversations and campaigns.
focus_areas: Live Chat, AI Chatbots, Customer Engagement & Digital Platform
All-in-One WhatsApp Solutions for Enterprises & MSMEs
